snippet.title: Metal: Hellsinger VR – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Metal: Hellsinger, the pure metal rhythm shooter with the multi award-winning soundtrack performed by metal legends, is coming to Meta Quest 2, 3 and Pro, PSVR2 and Steam VR in 2024!

Wishlist now: https://metalhellsinger.com/

Step into the body of the Unknown in full VR and become a true demon of vengeance. Metal: Hellsinger VR redesigns the acclaimed rhythm shooter from the ground up, placing its infernal arsenal straight into your hands and the fires of Hell at your feet. Enjoy a range of features from the original game, including the full epic campaign, Archdevil difficulty, Torment Challenges, and Beast Assist Mode, reimagined for VR.

#metalhellsinger #metaquestpro #steamvr

Follow us on our official social media channels to never miss a beat:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/metalhellsinger
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MetalHellsinger/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/metalhellsinger/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@metalhellsinger
